description:
Japanese title: Akatsuki, ShidÅ (æš, å§‹å‹•)

Naruto and Sakura team up and challenge Kakashi to a survival challenge to show off their progress.
name: The Akatsuki Makes Its Move

description:
Japanese title: ShugyÅ no Seika (ä¿®æ¥­ã®æˆæžœ)

Narutoâ€™s and Sakuraâ€™s combined skills force Kakashi to use his Sharingan right off the bat. Naruto masterfully unleashes his jutsu one after another.
name: The Results of Training

description:
Japanese title: Suna no JinchÅ«riki (ç ‚ã®äººæŸ±åŠ›)

Gaara is quick to detect Deidaraâ€™s presence, and an aerial battle ensues with Deidara on his giant bird and Gaara atop sand.
name: The Jinchuriki of the Sand

description:
Japanese title: Kazekage to shite...! (é¢¨å½±ã¨ã—ã¦...!)

Naruto and Sakura defeat Kakashi in the survival challenge. Tsunade assigns them to a three-man squad led by Kakashi, who tells them they are now his equals.
name: The Kazekage Stands Tall

description:
Japanese title: NorumakuriÄ (ãƒŽãƒ«ãƒžã‚¯ãƒªã‚¢ãƒ¼)

In order to protect his village from Deidaraâ€™s explosive clay, Gaara uses his chakra to create a giant sand shield.
name: Mission Cleared

description:
Japanese title: Hashire KankurÅ (ç–¾èµ°ã‚Œã‚«ãƒ³ã‚¯ãƒ­ã‚¦)

Gaara, his strength completely exhausted, is whisked away by Deidara. Kankuro ignores Bakiâ€™s efforts to stop him and immediately sets out in pursuit with a platoon to rescue Gaara.
name: Run, Kankuro

description:
Japanese title: Shutsugeki, Kakashi-han (å‡ºæ’ƒ, ã‚«ã‚«ã‚·ç­)

An urgent message from the Sand Village detailing the Akatsukiâ€™s kidnapping of the Kazekage reaches the Hidden Leaf Village. Tsunade wastes no time in ordering Team Kakashi to the Sand Village.
name: Team Kakashi Deployed

description:
Japanese title: JinchÅ«riki no Namida (äººæŸ±åŠ›ã®æ¶™)

On her way to the Sand Village, Temari encounters Kakashi and his team. Kakashi admonishes Naruto when he tries to rush aheadâ€¦
name: The JinchÅ«riki's Tears

description:
Japanese title: FÅ«in Jutsu: GenryÅ« KyÅ« FÅ«jin (å°å°è¡“Â·å¹»é¾ä¹å°å°½)

The Sand ninja fight against time to treat Kankuro. Even the Sandâ€™s poison expert, Granny Chiyo, is baffled. The only hope lies with the reinforcements sent by Tsunade.
name: Sealing Jutsu: Nine Phantom Dragons

first_appearance_objects.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

object_credits.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

description:
Japanese title: IryÅ Ninja no Deshi (åŒ»ç™‚å¿è€…ã®å¼Ÿå­)

Sakura treats a critically ill Kankuro. After extensive training sheâ€™s now a full-fledged Medic Ninja, and Sakura amazes everyone with her sure, steady hands.
name: The Medical Ninja's Student

first_appearance_objects.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

object_credits.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

description:
Japanese title: Inkyo BabÄ no Ketsui (éš å±…ãƒãƒã‚¢ã®æ±ºæ„)

Pakkun finds the hideout of the Akatsuki. Team Kakashi and Temari prepare to set out to get Gaara back, but Temari is ordered to stay behind and help guard the village.
name: The Retired Granny's Determination

first_appearance_objects.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

object_credits.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

description:
Japanese title: Innen Aimamieru (å› ç¸ã‚ã„ã¾ã¿ãˆã‚‹)

Team Kakashi encounter Itachi Uchiha, who had dealt them a bitter defeat in the past. Kakashi warns everyone not to look into Itachiâ€™s Sharingan Eyes.
name: A Meeting With Destiny

first_appearance_objects.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

object_credits.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

description:
Japanese title: Naruto no SeichÅ (ãƒŠãƒ«ãƒˆã®æˆé•·)

Guy prepares to use a forbidden secret jutsu. Meanwhile, Naruto falls under Itachiâ€™s genjutsu, and all the anti-genjutsu training he underwent with Jiraiya races through Narutoâ€™s mind.
name: Naruto's Growth

description:
Japanese title: Kakushidama Nazukete (éš ã—çŽ‰ åä»˜ã‘ã¦...!)

Granny Chiyo and Sakura rescue Naruto from Itachiâ€™s genjutsu. Without a momentâ€™s delay, Kakashi begins a counterattack.
name: The Secret Weapon is Called....

description:
Japanese title: JinchÅ«riki no Himitsu (äººæŸ±åŠ›ã®ç§˜å¯†)

Chiyo and Kakashi realize that the attack was just a diversion, and that the Akatsuki have already begun the process of extracting the Tailed Beast from Gaara.
name: The Secret of JinchÅ«riki

first_appearance_objects.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

object_credits.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

description:
Japanese title: Gaara Shisu! (æˆ‘æ„›ç¾…æ­»ã™!)

Teams Kakashi and Guy take a short rest. Granny Chiyo watches Naruto dozing off and is reminded of Sasori as a child.
name: The Death of Gaara!

first_appearance_objects.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

object_credits.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

description:
Japanese title: TotsunyÅ«! Botan Fukku EntorÄ« (çªå…¥!ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ãƒ•ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒªãƒ¼)

Teams Kakashi and Guy reach the Akatsuki hideout. They hurry to infiltrate but are thwarted by a five-seal barrier.
name: Charge Tactic! Button Hook Entry!!

first_appearance_objects.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

object_credits.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

description:
Japanese title: Torappu SadÅ! Gai-han no Teki (ç½ ä½œå‹•!ã‚¬ã‚¤ç­ã®æ•µ)

Breaking the five-seal barrier set off a trap, which now has Team Guy battling amazingly accurate copies of themselves.
name: Traps Activate! Team Guyâ€™s Enemy

description:
Japanese title: Hiruko vs. Futari no Kunoichi (ãƒ’ãƒ«ã‚³VSäºŒäººã®å¥³å¿è€…)

At last, the showdown between the old woman and her grandson begins.
name: Hiruko vs. Two Kunoichi!

first_appearance_objects.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

object_credits.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

description:
Japanese title: Sasori no Sugao (ã‚µã‚½ãƒªã®ç´ é¡”)

Granny Chiyo and Sakura manage to expose Sasori, who amazingly looks no older than he did twenty years earlier.
name: Sasori's Real Face

description:
Japanese title: Chiyo no Oku no Te (ãƒãƒ¨ã®å¥¥ã®æ‰‹)

Sakura is caught by Sasoriâ€™s tactic and surrounded by a poison cloud.
name: Chiyo's Secret Skills

description:
Japanese title: "Chichi" to "Haha"

Chiyo and Sakura take cover, and Sasori wastes no time unleashing a ruthless attack.
name: Father and Mother

description:
Japanese title: Sandaime Kazekage (ä¸‰ä»£ç›®é¢¨å½±)

Sakura counters the Iron Sand attack of the Third Kazekage puppet with superhuman strength. She learned from Tsunade that the most important skill of a Medic Ninja is the ability to evade an attack. She quickly begins to read Sasoriâ€™s attack patterns. Sasori decides that he is wasting time, and prepared to exhaust his chakra, he uses his Iron Sand: Unleashed! jutsu, which spreads over a vast area to capture the target. The Iron Sand attack permeates space, and inevitably, Sakura sustains a hand injury and
name: The Third Kazekage

description:
Japanese title: Sei to Shi no Sanpunkan (ç”Ÿã¨æ­»ã®ä¸‰åˆ†é–“)

Sakura destroys the Third Kazekage puppet thanks to a secret antidote she had taken. Sakuro explains to a surprised Granny Chiyo that this antidote converts the poison into harmless protein and is effective for about three minutes. Chiyo and Sakura resolve to bring Sasori down within that time limit. Sasori has no choice but to acknowledge Sakuraâ€™s true power and unleash his trump card. At the same time, Naruto and Kakashi plan a strategy to capture Deidara.
name: Three Minutes Between Life and Death

first_appearance_objects.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

object_credits.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

description:
Japanese title: Jukki vs Hyakki (åæ©Ÿvsç™¾æ©Ÿ)

Sakura and Granny Chiyo are engaged in a fierce battle with Sasori, who is able turn himself into a human puppet. They somehow bring Sasori down within the time limit, but he ends up reviving. Chiyo summons puppets with a technique she had banned herself from using, Secret White Move: Chikamtasuâ€™s Ten Puppets. To counter that, Sasori resorts to his Secret Red move Performance of a Hundred Puppets. Sakuraâ€™s antidote has worn off, but she joins Granny Chiyo, and the two attack for a final decisive battle!
name: Puppet Fight: 10 vs. 100!

description:
Japanese title: Kanawanu Yume (å¶ã‚ã¬å¤¢)

Although stung with poison herself, Granny Chiyo uses the last of the antidote on Sakura. Mocking the tender scene between Granny Chiyo and Sakura, Sasori attempts to end Granny Chiyo's life. Right at that moment, Granny Chiyo fights back and successfully defeats Sasori. But Sakura has been struck in a vital spot and is on the brink of death. Ironically, the only thing that can save Sakura, is a jutsu that Granny Chiyo once created for Sasori.
name: Impossible Dream

description:
Japanese tilte: Yomigaeru Kemono-tachi (è˜‡ã‚‹ç£ãŸã¡)

Team Guy senses the result of the Sakura and Granny Chiyoâ€™s desperate struggle while still in battle with his deadly copy. Although Guyâ€™s team members are showing fatigue, their copies remain strong! Lee's plan to turn the tide sets fire to the team members' fighting spirit! Meanwhile, Naruto goes after Deidara, who has seized Gaara. Even as they are in hot pursuit, preparations for Kakashi's new technique are underway!
name: Beasts: Alive Again!

description:
Japanese title: Kakashi Kaigan! (ã‚«ã‚«ã‚·é–‹çœ¼!)

Sakura hurries to get to Naruto with Granny Chiyo, who is suffering from the poison. The members of Team Guy rush to assist Team Kakashi. Meanwhile, with all preparations complete, Kakashi reveals his Mangekyo Sharingan. This powerful jutsu transports whatever the eye can see into another dimension. Catching Deidara in an unguarded moment, Naruto is finally able to rescue Gaara. But seeing Gaara's current state enrages Naruto.
name: Kakashi Enlightened!

description:
Japanese title: Shunkan no Bigaku (çž¬é–“ã®ç¾Žå­¦)

Naruto loses all reason to anger and is gradually taken over by the Nine-Tailed Fox Spirit. Having been forewarned by Jiraiya, Kakashi narrowly manages to suppress the Nine-Tailed Fox. Deidara, spying on them, finds out about Sasori's defeat when Sakura and Granny Chiyo appear. Just then, Team Guy arrives, and he is trapped. Cornered and no longer able to work his jutsu, Deidara attempts to blow himself up along with the Leaf ninja!
name: Aesthetics of an Instant!

description:
Japanese title: Tsugareyukumono (ç¶™ãŒã‚Œã‚†ãã‚‚ã®)

Relying on Naruto's power, Granny Chiyo performs the Transmigration Jutsu on Gaara. Sakura is saddened when she realizes the cost of this jutsu. But in a firm voice Granny Chiyo passes on wisdom to these young ninja. When Gaara finally awakens, he finds himself surrounded by Naruto and the others and by a crowd of Sand ninja who had come after him. In the commotion following Gaara's resurrection, Granny Chiyo breathes her last. Realizing the truth behind the Transmigration Jutsu, everyone pays their respect.
name: The Legacy

description:
Japanese title: Kazekage no Kikan (é¢¨å½±ã®å¸°é‚„)

Gaara and his rescuers make a triumphant return to the Hidden Sand Village. After paying their respects at Granny Chiyo's grave, Naruto and the Leaf ninja reluctantly take their leave. Naruto shakes Gaara's hand in parting. Elsewhere, an injured Deidara appears before Zetsu and his subordinate Tobi. He has been in hiding after destroying a clone in a diversionary tactic. Back in the Hidden Leaf Village, someone tries to sneak a mysterious boy named Sai onto Kakashi's team!
name: Return of the Kazekage

description:
Japanese title: Aratanaru tÄgetto (æ–°ãŸãªã‚‹ç›®æ¨™)

Everyone has returned to the Hidden Leaf Village. Kakashi is hospitalized for a week due to the strain caused by his Mangekyo Sharingan. But he is scheduled to meet with Orochimaru's contact in four days' time. Despite Shizune's pleas to send another team, Tsunade declares that she will send Team Kakashi to do the job. Hearing this, Naruto hurries back to the village in search of reinforcements for the team, but is attacked on the way by the mysterious Sai!
name: The New Target

description:
Japanese title:Kessei! Shin Kakashi han (çµæˆ!æ–°ã‚«ã‚«ã‚·ç­)

After attacking Naruto, Sai predicts that they will meet again soon, then vanishes. Tsunade meets with the village elders, Homura and Koharu, who feel that Naruto, as a Jinchuuriki, should not be sent on missions involving the Akatsuki. Tsunade refuses to comply. In return for accepting her unreasonable refusal, the elders demand that she add a ninja recommended by Danzo to Kakashi's team.
name: Formation! New Team Kakashi!

description:
Japanese title: Gadatensoku (ç”»è›‡æ·»è¶³)

Naruto is enraged when he discovers that Sai attacked him in order to test his strength. Sakura pulls them apart, but tensions are running high between the members of Team Kakashi. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamato, and Shizune gather in Kakashi's hospital room. Jiraiya reports on Naruto's reckless behavior to alert Yamato. Meanwhile, Sai receives a mysterious envelope from a Foundation operative. What secret mission has Sai been assigned by Danzo? With speculation running rampant, the time for Team Kakashi's depart.
name: An Unnecessary Addition

description:
Japanese title: Itsuwari no egao (å½ã‚Šã®ç¬‘é¡”)

The new Team Kakashi heads for Tenchikyo. To Naruto, Sai is just temporarily filling in for Sasuke. When Sai shows his contempt for Sasuke, the antagonism comes to a head. Yamato steps in to settle everyone down. To everyone's astonishment, Yamato uses the Wood-Style ninjutsu that only the First Hokage was said to know. Ignoring Sakura's reaction, Yamato decides they will stay overnight at a hot-spring inn in order to try to improve the rocky relations among his team members.
name: The Fake Smile

description:
Japanese title: Mudai (ç„¡é¡Œ)

Sakura comes across Sai working on an abstract painting. He tells her that he's unable to give it a title. Bothered by his manner, Sakura finds an unusual picture book among Sai's things. As the group later hurries toward Tenchikyo they are on guard against a possible ambush by the Akatsuki. Yamato is aware of the difficulty of the goal of this mission, which is to take Sasoriâ€™s spy into custody, so he pairs everyone up in the event that a battle begins.
name: Untitled

description:
Japanese title: ShimyurÄ“shon (æ¨¡æ“¬æˆ¦é—˜è¨“ç·´)

In preparation for Tenchikyo, Yamato conducts a half-day simulation in order to get a grasp on the fighting skills and jutsu of Team Kakashi. Sai abandons Naruto to conclude the simulated mission successfully. Naruto is angered, and a conflict seems inevitable, but Naruto declares that â€œIf it will help to save Sasuke, I will team up with Sai.â€ Sakura understands Naruto's strong feelings about Sasuke, but Sai suddenly blurts out, â€œI have no emotions.â€
name: Simulation

description:
Japanese title: TenchikyÅ (å¤©åœ°æ©‹)

The day for capturing the spy is finally here. Just as planned, Yamato takes on Sasori's likeness and waits until the Akatsuki spy appears. The spy turns out to be none other than Kabuto. Naruto and his group can't hide their astonishment, but suddenly, who should appear but Orochimaru himself. The situation quickly changes, and Team Kakashi find themselves in an unexpected and dangerous predicament.
name: The Tenchi Bridge

description:
Japanese title: KyÅ«bi kaihÅ!! (ä¹å°¾è§£æ”¾!!)

Faced with Orochimaru, his sworn enemy, Naruto suddenly releases the power of his Nine-Tailed Fox. When Yamato sees Naruto's fourth tail appear, he recalls Jiraiya's tale of how he nearly lost his life to the transformed Naruto. Yamato has been ordered to suppress the Nine-Tail chakra that would adversely affect Naruto's body. Then, the secret of Yamato's Wood-Style ninjutsu becomes apparent.
name: Nine-Tails Unleashed

description:
Japanese title: Gokuhi ninmu sutÄto (æ¥µç§˜ä»»å‹™ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒˆ)

When his third tail appears, all that Naruto can see is Orochimaru. He is blind even to his teammates. As the fighting accelerates, Sakura is knocked unconscious. While Yamato is distracted saving Sakura, Sai finally sets his top-secret mission, entrusted to him by Danzo, into motion. Meanwhile, taunted by Orochimaru and impatient to rescue Sasuke, Naruto finally releases his forbidden fourth tail.
name: The Top-Secret Mission Begins

description:
Japanese title: Orochimaru tai JinchÅ«riki (å¤§è›‡ä¸¸VSäººæŸ±åŠ›)

With the release of his fourth tail, Naruto completely loses his awareness and is overtaken by destructive impulses. When Saiâ€™s and Yamato's clones are finally able to get close enough, they witness a horrifying battle between Orochimaru and the transformed Naruto. Yamato is puzzled that Naruto is able to function wrapped in evil chakra too powerful for a normal person to withstand. In the gale born from the Triple Rashomon and high-density chakra, Naruto's power and appearance become demonlike as he get.
name: Orochimaru VS Jinchuuriki

description:
Japanese title: Sakura no namida (ã‚µã‚¯ãƒ©ã®æ¶™)

Although he has changed almost completely into his animal form and has lost all awareness, Naruto refuses to give up the idea of bringing Sasuke home. Moved by Naruto's condition, Sakura ignores Yamato's restraints and runs to Naruto and is injured by him. Yamato is finally able to use his Wood-Style ninjutsu to halt the Nine-Tailed Foxâ€™s rampage. Meanwhile, Orochimaru reaches his limit and tries to leave the battleground, but is confronted by Sai, who has brought him a message from Danzo.
name: Sakura's Tears

description:
Japanese title: Tatakai no tenmatsu (æˆ¦ã„ã®é¡›æœ«)

Taking advantage of the confusion, Sai makes contact with Orochimaru. After reviewing the contents of the documents given to him, Orochimaru decides to take Sai back to the hideout. Meanwhile, Yamato is able to stop Naruto's rampage, but the damage to Naruto's body is severe. Yamato sees how distressed Sakura is over her powerlessness. When Naruto comes to, Yamato tells him and Sakura that Sai is gone, and that there is a possibility that Sai's superior, Danzo, is plotting something terrible.
name: The Secret of the Battle!

description:
Japanese title: Uragiri no hate (è£åˆ‡ã‚Šã®æžœã¦)

Naruto and Sakura are shocked when they hear that Danzo's goal is to work with Orochimaru to once again attempt to defeat the Leaf Village. Sakura worries about Naruto, who is still recovering from his rampage, but when Yamato explains that they'll never have another such chance against Orochimaru, they begin their pursuit. The injuries inflicted by Naruto as the Nine-Tailed Fox cause Sakura to fall behind, and Team Kakashi is forced to take a break. Meanwhile, Orochimaru realizes that he is being followed.
name: The Consequences of Betrayal

description:
Japanese title: Mikan no pÄ“ji (æœªå®Œã®é )

Naruto is shocked to learn that he was the one responsible for the destruction around them and for Sakura's injuries. Yamato tells him that he will, hereafter, suppress the power of the Nine-Tailed Fox with his Wood-Style ninjutsu, and he counsels Naruto not to rely on Nine-Tails but to use his own powers. Meanwhile, Sakura has questions about a strange story she discovers in Sai's picture book. The story seems to be about Sai and his older brother, butâ€¦
name: The Unfinished Page

description:
Japanese title: SennyÅ«! Dokuhebi no ajito (æ½œå…¥!æ¯’è›‡ã®å·£çªŸ)

Sai shudders when he finally meets Sasuke face to face in Orochimaru's hideout. The list that Sai gave to Orochimaru lists the members of the Anbu Black Ops, the corps under the direct control of the Hokage. Sai stays with Orochimaru in exchange for some valuable information, but until he can be trusted completely, he is given a room where he will be under house arrest. When he is alone, Sai cautiously looks around and begins to summon a book.
name: Infiltration: The Den of the Snake!

description:
Japanese title: Tsunagari (ã¤ãªãŒã‚Š)

Team Kakashi is able to find Sai with Yamato guiding them. They immediately begin questioning Sai about Danzo's plans for destroying the Leaf Village, and surprisingly, Sai divulges everything. Naruto and his team are irritated that he remains absolutely unemotional, but Sai declares that, as a member of the Foundation, â€œI do not exist.â€ However, from all of his actions, Sakura detects some strong feelings in his subconscious and points out to Sai the contradictions in his behavior.
name: Bonds

description:
Japanese title: Taisetsu na mono (å¤§åˆ‡ãªãƒ¢ãƒŽ)

Kabuto carries out a surprise attack on Team Kakashi to take back Sai, but a change has come over Sai since Sakura pointed out his contradictions. With the information that they get out of the captured Kabuto, the search for Sasuke nears its end. As Naruto and Sakura run to find Sasuke, fond memories of Sasuke and of their parting bloom in their hearts.
name: Something Important...

description:
Japanese title: Ehon ga kataru sutÅri (çµµæœ¬ãŒèªžã‚‹ç‰©èªž)

Naruto, while nursing his injuries caused by the release of the Nine-Tailed Fox, searches frantically for Sasuke. Seeing this, Sai recalls the feelings he once had for his older brother and finally manages to complete his unfinished picture. For the first time, they see a sincere smile on his face. A sudden attack by Orochimaru mars the brief, tranquil scene. Before he vanishes Sai promises that he will save Sasuke. However, Yamato finds an ominous truth among the belongings that Sai leaves behind.
name: The Picture Book's Story

description:
Japanese title: Saikai (å†ä¼š)

Team Kakashi are stunned to learn that Sai's true mission is to kill Sasuke. Naruto wants to believe that the smile Sai showed them was real, but there is a possibility that it was all an act. Meanwhile, Sai has reached Sasuke. Kill him, or save himâ€¦ Which ending does Sai, a Foundation operative, choose? Sai and Sasuke battle it out, demolishing a part of the hideout. Naruto and the others follows the signs of chakra, and they are finally reunited with Sasuke.
name: Reunion

description:
Japanese title: Uchiha no chikara (ã†ã¡ã¯ã®åŠ›)

Team Kakashi finally have their wish to be reunited with Sasuke granted. Although it has been three long years, Sasuke's feelings have not changed. His ultimate goal is to get revenge against his older brother, Itachi. Declaring that he has cut all ties with Naruto and the others, Sasuke begins to attack the Leaf ninja. They are overwhelmed by Sasukeâ€™s skills. Sensing the inferiority of his host, the Nine-Tailed Fox urges Naruto on from within, but Sasuke uses his well-developed Sharingan to enter Naruto'.
name: The Power of the Uchiha
